data.comment: The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Barnsley with the kick-off.
Andy Woolmer blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, Andy Woolmer blows to start the second-half. Nottingham with the kick-off.
Valerien Ismael (Barnsley) is making a first substitution, with Herbie Kane replacing Matty James.
Luke Thomas is replacing Dominik Frieser for the home team.
In the minute 73, Nottingham make their first substitution with Luke Freeman replacing Miguel Angel Guerrero.
The home team have replaced Conor Chaplin with Victor Adeboyejo. This is the third substitution made today by Valerien Ismael.
Valerien Ismael is making the team's fourth substitution at Oakwell Ground with Clarke Oduor replacing Alex Mowatt.
In the minute 85, Goal! Barnsley have got their heads in front thanks to a Callum Styles strike.
Brice Samba for Nottingham has been booked by Andy Woolmer and receives a first yellow card.
Goal! Cauley Woodrow extends Barnsley's lead to 2-0.
The home team replace Callum Brittain with Jordan Williams.
